content.question: The examples inside the dashes in lines 1-2 serve to emphasize

choices.label: the formulaic manner in which most texts are studied
the broad applicability of the reading strategies that follow
the difference between the Declaration and works of imaginative literature
the variety of forms of writing that existed at the time of the Declaration

content.answer: the broad applicability of the reading strategies that follow

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Explain how grammar and mechanics contribute to the clarity and effectiveness of an argument.
